DataElement.preferredName: Measured Calculated Creatinine Greater Than Equal 1.5 Times Upper Limit Normal Patient Creatinine Clearance Greater Than Equal 60 Millimeter Minute Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a patient with a (serum) Creatinine level of greater than or equal 1.5 times the institution upper limit of normal (ULN) has a measured/calculated Creatinine clearance of greater than or equal to 60 millimeters per minute (mL/min).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Measured Calculated Creatinine Greater Than Equal 1.5 Upper Limit Normal Patient Creatinine Clearance Greater Than Equal 60 Millimeter Minute Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having been determined by measurement._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::60_A quantitative measurement of the amount of creatinine present in a sample of serum._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1.5_The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Measured Calculation Creatinine Measurement Greater Than Integer::1.5 Upper Limit of Normal Patient
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having been determined by measurement.:The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A quantitative measurement of the amount of creatinine present in a sample.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1.5:The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
A quantitative measurement of the amount of creatinine present in a sample.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Creatinine Clearance Greater Than or Equal To Integer::60 Milliliter per Minute Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the clearance of endogenous creatinine, used for evaluating the glomerular filtration rate.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::60:A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to one minute.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the clearance of endogenous creatinine, used for evaluating the glomerular filtration rate.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to one minute.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
